cab.content: SECRET, ... 398 I7A3 CABINET, - ADMIRALTY SHIPBUILDING PROGRAMME, Note by the Secretary, War Cabinet, *;ith reference to ^/ar Cabinet 169, Minute 16 (e)I have received information from the Admiralty that it hasbeen found possible to arrange for the construction of aseaplane carrior to the new design, without interferingwith other orders, and the order is now being placed withMessrs. Armstrong, fthitwerth & Company, (Initialled) M*?*A*H*Z IThitehall Gardens * S,V, :14th: July, 1917.
